message.entry: The first two inputs must have the same size.
The first two inputs must have the same class.
The first two inputs must have the same dimension labels.
The 'DataFormat' value must be a character vector or string scalar containing characters 'S', 'C', 'B'.
The 'DataFormat' value must contain a channel dimension specified by the character 'C'.
The 'DataFormat' value must contain a spatial dimension specified by the character 'S'.
The dlarray inputs must contain dimension labels 'S', 'C', or 'B'.
The dlarray inputs must contain a channel dimension.
The dlarray inputs must contain a spatial dimension.
Specify 'DataFormat' when input argument at position {0} is an unformatted dlarray.
'DataFormat' is not supported when the input argument at position {0} is not a dlarray.
'DataFormat' is not supported when the input argument at position {0} is a formatted dlarray.
